channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly Tipping vandalism, 25th June
item.description:
I have Witnessed A Resident Ritter Street SE18 4DT vandalise planted bushes on the walk way off the estate cutting them back to the stem and then dumping all the mass off the waste on a walkway off the estate making it unsafe pedestrians and causing a potential trip hazard. .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ritter Street, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Someone left trash in the Lift, 25th June
item.description:
Someone has left trash in the lift. I was just about to use it but the litter in the lift makes it unusable. This is actually so vile.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Murray Grove, Hackney, London

item.title: Smashed glass outside building where lots of children live, 25th June
item.description:
There is smashed glass on the pavement at the entrance to our building. And the same refuge bags left in the same weekly spot on the corner of salcombe and Truman's Road.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Salcombe Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Railings requires removing and fixing by the borough, 25th June
item.description:
Site presented a Road traffic accident involving damaged to traffic lights that are affected by railing railings requires removing and fixing by the borough so we can proceed with repairs on site
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Random wrong messages on signs, 25th June
item.description:
The electronic signs on the A2 coastbound carriagway between Bluewater and Gravesend look like they are faulty - random low speed limits, lane closures and wrong messages are being displayed differently on each set of gantries causing drivers to swerve and likely to cause an accident. This was at about 2325 on Tuesday 24 June 2026.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dartford Bypass, Darenth, Dartford
Report on FixMyStreet
